mapper.select: update INSBWorktimearea set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},insbworktimeid = #{insbworktimeid},workdaystart = #{workdaystart},workdayend = #{workdayend},daytimestart = #{daytimestart},daytimeend = #{daytimeend},isremindtime = #{isremindtime} where id = #{id}
select * from INSBWorktimearea where insbworktimeid = #{insbworktimeid} and isremindtime = #{isremindtime}
